name: Cactus Boy
description:
A cactus lives in a desert and lost its important oasis. Help the cactus to find rain clouds and a new oasis before drying!!

Controls:

A - move left

B - move right

Space - jump

Credits:

Code: Tatu Katajisto

Graphics: S. Hietaoja

Design, audio, marketing and production: KennaJana
